
```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, Exec_Summary}
  exec.sum.text <- readLines(file.path(params$child.file.path, "Executive_Summary_Text.Rmd"))
  text.to.replace <- unique(do.call(rbind, str_match_all(exec.sum.text, "XXX__\\s*(.*?)\\s*__XXX")))

  for (i in seq(nrow(text.to.replace))) exec.sum.text <- gsub(text.to.replace[i,1], eval(parse(text=paste0("params[['", text.to.replace[i,2], "']][[1]]"))), exec.sum.text, fixed=TRUE)

  cat(exec.sum.text, sep = "\n")
  # cat(readLines("./assets/child/Executive_Summary.Rmd"), sep = "\n") # this line ONLY for custom state exec summary
```
